title: Esther O’Reilly, Reality Rules, Boethius, Jordan Peterson and the Heroic Thesis
description:
Interview with Esther O’Reilly

Homo Sapiens’ unique heroic thesis according to Jordan Peterson:  “The nature of experience can be altered for the better by voluntary alteration of action and thought.”

Greg Boyd and Open Theism
Boethius, The Consolation of Philosophy
Molinism

“Reality is that which governs.”  Paul VanderKlay

Your beliefs are exposed by your behavior.  We say one thing and do another, and come up against our own hypocrisy.

Mandelbrot sets, Fibonacci series, the approximation of Pi
